mutants.original_line: "Uninstall the .NET framework from your system. You can do this from the Add or Remove Programs section in the Control Panel.",
mutants.mutated_line: steps = ['', 'Once .NET is uninstalled, restart your system.', 'Download the latest .NET framework from the official website and install it.', 'After installing the .NET framework, install the MVC CTP5 again.', 'Test to see if this has fixed your problem.', 'If the problem is still not fixed, try opening the project in a different VS instance or reinstalling Visual Studio altogether.', "If the error persists, it may be best to seek further help from Microsoft or from the forum where you're more likely to find people dealing with the same development tools and issues.", 'Remember to backup your work before proceeding with these steps to prevent data loss.']
